item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 1, 2025 at 4:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. A DOGE staffer appears to be posting DOGE work on his public GitHub (298 points | 225 comments)
2. How to gain code execution on hundreds of millions of people and popular apps (904 points | 217 comments)
3. The vinyl-carver sparking a craze for cutting records at home (70 points | 39 comments)
4. OpenGL to WASM, learning from my mistakes (15 points | 7 comments)
5. Depending in Common Lisp – Using the CLOS dependent maintenance protocol (2022) (40 points | 1 comment)
6. Yes, Claude Code can decompile itself. Here's the source code (135 points | 69 comments)
7. Certificate Transparency in Firefox: A Big Step for Web Security (94 points | 70 comments)
8. Zen 5's AVX-512 Frequency Behavior (133 points | 40 comments)
9. Inheriting is becoming nearly as important as working (322 points | 419 comments)
10. 3,200% CPU Utilization (418 points | 192 comments)
11. Maestro – Next Generation Mobile UI Automation (10 points | 1 comment)
12. Why it's so hard to build a jet engine (261 points | 93 comments)
13. The Housing Theory of Everything (2021) (164 points | 144 comments)
14. What do people see when they're tripping? Analyzing Erowid's trip reports (74 points | 108 comments)
15. OlmOCR: Open-source tool to extract plain text from PDFs (253 points | 30 comments)
16. Harnessing orbital Hall effect in spin-orbit torque MRAM (36 points | discuss)
17. Affixes: The Building Blocks of English (85 points | 12 comments)
18. Troubleshooting: A skill that never goes obsolete (285 points | 97 comments)
19. Type++: Prohibiting Type Confusion with Inline Type Information [pdf] (7 points | discuss)
20. When eBPF pt_regs reads return garbage on the latest Linux kernels, blame Fred (90 points | 8 comments)
21. AI is killing some companies, yet others are thriving – let's look at the data (216 points | 219 comments)
22. Write to Escape Your Default Setting (347 points | 82 comments)
23. Show HN: Torii – a framework agnostic authentication library for Rust (66 points | 16 comments)
24. An update on Mozilla's terms of use for Firefox (471 points | 280 comments)
25. Resident physicians' exam scores tied to patient survival (73 points | 61 comments)
26. The serotonin theory of depression: a systematic review of the evidence (2022) (117 points | 88 comments)
27. Merlion: A Machine Learning Framework for Time Series Intelligence (148 points | 21 comments)
28. Surgery implants tooth material in eye as scaffolding for lens (131 points | 52 comments)
29. Japanese Toshiba Typewriter Model BW-2112 (2020) [video] (82 points | 14 comments)
30. Violence alters human genes for generations, researchers discover (413 points | 231 comments)
